Text: Man Booker International Prize:  The introduction of the International Prize to complement the Man Booker Prize was announced in June 2004.

Text: Man Booker International Prize:  Sponsored by the Man Group, from 2005 until 2015 the award was given every two years to a living author of any nationality for a body of work published in English or generally available in English translation.

Text: Man Booker International Prize:  The judges for the year compiled their own lists of authors, and submissions were not invited.
